mapper.select: select to_char(sysdate + (level-1), 'yyyy-mm-dd') as week from dual connect by level <= 7

select * from (select distinct to_char(schedule_time_start, 'hh24:mi') as schedule_time_start, to_char(schedule_time_end, 'hh24:mi') as schedule_time_end , s.schedule_no, m.movie_title, s.screen_no , m.movie_type, m.movie_grade, movie_no from schedule_tbl s left join movie_tbl m using(movie_no) where to_date(schedule_open, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= to_date(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(schedule_close, 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= to_date(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) where schedule_time_start >= to_char(sysdate, 'hh24:mi')
order by schedule_time_start asc
and movie_no = #{movieNo} order by schedule_time_start asc
select distinct seat_row from seat_tbl where screen_no =#{screenNo} order by 1
select price, movie_type, price_per_age from price_tbl where movie_no = #{movieNo}
select * from seat_tbl where screen_no=#{screenNo} and seat_row = #{row} order by 2 asc
select member_no from member_tbl where member_id = #{memberId}
select * from coupon_box_tbl join coupon_tbl using(coupon_no) where member_no=#{memberNo} and use_status = 'n'
mapper.update: update coupon_box_tbl set use_status = 'y' where coupon_no =#{couponNo} and member_no =#{memberNo}
mapper.select: select price_no from price_tbl where movie_no is null and price_per_age =#{i}
select book_no from book_tbl where member_no = #{memberNo} and schedule_no =#{scheduleNo} and to_char(booking_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') = to_char(#{bookingDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')
select seat_no from seat_tbl where seat_row = #{bookSeatRow} and seat_column = #{bookSeatColumn}
